mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AMTF_User WHERE USER_ACCOUNT=#{user_account} AND USER_PASSWORD=#{userpwd}
SELECT * FROM AMTF_POWER WHERE power_pow <= CONVERT(#{pow} USING gb2312)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AMTF_User(User_id, User_Email, User_Account, User_Password, User_Name, User_Country, User_Province, User_City, User_Postcode, User_Phone, User_Introduce, User_Attestation, User_power ) VALUES( #{entityin.userid}, #{entityin.useremail}, #{entityin.useraccount}, #{entityin.userpwd}, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '0', 0 )
